infoModal.title: Info
infoModal.sourceText: We use the OpenFoodFacts API to get our data. This means that we have access to a large database of food products. This allows us to provide you with information about the product you scanned.
infoModal.dataAnomaliesTitle: Why the data sometimes looks weird:
infoModal.dataAnomaliesText: Due to the fact that all data in OpenFoodFacts is community-driven or analyzed automatically, there sometimes are mistakes in the data. This can be anything from wrong ingredients or wrong clustering of ingredients to missing information.
infoModal.contributionText: You can help to improve the experience for other users by contributing to the OpenFoodFacts database. You can do this by scanning products with your phone and uploading pictures. This way you can aid to make the database even bigger and better.

processedGrade.title: NOVA
processedGrade.1: Unprocessed or minimally processed foods (Fresh, Frozen, Fermented)
processedGrade.4: Ultra-processed foods and beverages (multiple processing steps, preservatives)

nutrition.title: Nutri
nutrition.A: Very good compared to products from the same product group
nutrition.B: Good compared to products from the same product group
nutrition.C: Moderate compared to products from the same product group
nutrition.D: Poor compared to products from the same product group
nutrition.E: Very poor compared to products from the same product group

plantGrade.title: Plant Grade
plantGrade.1: All Ingredients are vegan and vegeterian.
plantGrade.2: This should never be possibly the case.
plantGrade.3: All Ingredients are vegeterian, but at least one is not vegan.
plantGrade.4: There are ingredients that are neither vegeterian nor vegan.

scanner.description: Scan your first product to inform yourself about ingredients and quality.
